required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Relatlimab Plus Nivolumab Versus Nivolumab Alone in Participants With Advanced Melanoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind Phase 2/3 Study of Relatlimab Combined With Nivolumab Versus Nivolumab in Participants With Previously Untreated Metastatic or Unresectable Melanoma

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether nivolumab in combination with relatlimab is more effective than nivolumab by itself in treating unresectable melanoma or melanoma that has spread

primary_outcome.description: Phase 3 portion of trial. Assessed by a Blinded Independent Central Review (BICR)
Phase 2 portion of trial, assessed by a BICR

secondary_outcome.description: Phase 3 portion of trial, assessed by a BICR
Phase 2 portion of trial, assessed by a BICR. In the randomized population and in subgroups
Phase 2 portion of trial. In the randomized population and in subgroups
Phase 2 portion of trial. In subgroups.
Phase 2 portion of trial. In the randomized population and in subgroups

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of AEs Leading to Discontinuation

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding Bristol-Myers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must have histologically confirmed Stage III (unresectable) or Stage IV melanoma, per the AJCC staging system
- Participants must not have had prior systemic anticancer therapy for unresectable or metastatic melanoma
- Tumor tissue from an unresectable or metastatic site of disease must be provided for biomarker analyses
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants must not have active brain metastases or leptomeningeal metastases
- Participants must not have uveal melanoma
- Participants must not have an active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information,

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT # and Site #.
